original_text: Beware of false prophets, which come to you in sheep's clothing, but inwardly they are ravening wolves.
korean_text: 거짓 선지자들을 삼가라 양의 옷을 입고 너희에게 나아오나 속에는 노략질하는 이리라

sentences.original_text: which come to you in sheep's clothing
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 양의 옷을 입고 너희에게 나아오나

sentences.original_text: but inwardly they are ravening wolves
